Package game.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • city.cs.engine.Walker
          • game.entities.Player
  • public class Player
extends city.cs.engine.Walker
    The Player object is the main entity in the game, and the one used by the player in the game

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume​(int unmappedVolume)
        Sets the volume of the sound effects. It takes unmapped readings from 0 to 100 and converts them from 0.01 to 2.0 for the volume.
        Parameters:
        unmappedVolume - The unmapped value from the slider before it is transformed into a value for the volume changer.

      • toggleAudio

        Toggles audio on and off.

        Parameters:
        fileName - The filepath for the audio sample.
